    • Constructor Detail

      • FriendController

        @Inject
public FriendController​(controllers.AssetsFinder assetsFinder,
                        AchievementFactory achievementFactory,
                        UserFactory userFactory)
        Constructor of FriendController
        Parameters:
        assetsFinder -
        achievementFactory - allows access to achievements
        userFactory - allows access to users

    • Method Detail

      • friend

        public play.mvc.Result friend​(play.mvc.Http.Request request)
        passes on to friend's profile with important parameters of the friend
        Parameters:
        request - session has to include user_id of user and the name of the friend
        Returns:
        Status OK, if HTML page with all important parameters is shown

      • getAchievements

        public play.mvc.Result getAchievements​(play.mvc.Http.Request request)
        gets achievements of friend to be shown in friend's profile
        Parameters:
        request - session has to include user_id of user and the name of the friend
        Returns:
        Status OK, if a Map with achievement_id as key and achievement as value gets passed on as Json

      • getFriends

        public play.mvc.Result getFriends​(play.mvc.Http.Request request)
        gets friends of friend to be shown in friend's profile
        Parameters:
        request - session has to include user_id of user and the name of the friend
        Returns:
        Status OK, if List of names of friend's friends as Strings gets passed on as Json

      • getPicture

        public play.mvc.Result getPicture​(play.mvc.Http.Request request)
        gets picture_id of friend to be shown in friend's profile
        Parameters:
        request - session has to include user_id of user and the name of the friend
        Returns:
        Status OK, if friend's picture_id gets passed on as Json
